lines.text: I steal an empty slot machine and get 10 years, and this guy steals a million and gets 5. Figure that out, will yuh?

[Sarcastically]
That's why you got the 10 - to figure it out.
As far as 20 bucks and a mink coat will take me.
There are no secrets in jail.

[Indicating her fur coat]
See this? That's all that's standing between me and the WPA!
I'll be 58 when I get out.
Thief. Don't worry. I'll get me old job back again.
Well, they've never sent a millionaire to prison as long as I can remember.

[Angrily]
Where have you been for the last couple of years?
